original_title: In the Cold of the Night
overview: High profile fashion photographer Scott Bruin has been suffering from a series of increasingly disturbing and violent dreams in which he savagely attacks and murders a young woman. Fearing for his sanity, Scott begins to investigate these strange visions but slowly starts to believe that these all-too-real seeming nightmares might not be dreams after all and that the woman in them is in imminent danger.
tagline: Lost in a Sea of Passion He Found the Girl of His Nightmares
title: In the Cold of the Night
